title.en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Nightingale wo Mezasu

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢は夜告鳥〈ナイチンゲール〉をめざす
悪役令嬢は夜告鳥をめざす

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou wa Nightingale o Mezasu
Akuyaku Reijou wa Yoru Tsugedori o Mezasu

altTitles.en: Villain Lady Wishes to Be Like Nightingale
The Villainess Who Became a Nightingale

altTitles.zh: 恶役千金目标是成为夜告鸟

description.en:
An unpopular woman in her thirties, our protagonist's only pleasure in life is reading all the web novels she can get her hands on while soaking in the bath. Tragically, she carelessly fell asleep in the bath and drowned, and before she had opened her eyes, she entered a fantasy novel world with a fictional otome game theme. What's more is that she transmigrated as the villainess Leysritt!

All I wanted was to be able to enjoy my second life quietly! But because I saved the prince's life after he was hit by a carriage, the prince's younger brother took interest in me, and now I've become his fiancée?! With my knowledge from being a nurse in my past life, I want to be of help in this world. If I want to avoid a future of ruin… I must aim to be like Nightingale.
(Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)

---
**"If dragging my name through the mud is what it takes to save a life, then that's what I'll do!"**

After an unfortunate accident, a lonely woman in her thirties finds herself reincarnated as Leysritt Von Lotus, a beautiful, young noble lady. Instead of worrying about boring things like meetings, her biggest problems now include which snacks she wants served with her tea. But something feels off... This world looks an awful lot like the ones in the stories she liked to read in her past life! What if she's not the protagonist, but actually the villainess?! Watch as Leysritt navigates her brand new life, using her education as a nurse to overcome challenges and capture the hearts of those around her!

---

**Note:** The "Nightingale" in the title doesn't refer to a bird but a person called Florence Nightingale (1820-1910), also known as "the Lady With the Lamp," was a British nurse, social reformer, and statistician best known as the founder of modern nursing.

**Links:**
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9544fe/)
* [Original Light Novel](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09SLVRRDL)
description.ja:
異世界でナイチンゲールを目指します！

お風呂でWEB小説を読むのが趣味の私。今日も癒やしの時間を過ごそうと思っていたら気づけば湯船で溺れていて、さらに目が覚めたら「リーゼリット」という名の悪役令嬢に転生していて…！？
これ、流行りの異世界転生ってやつ－－－！？？原作の主人公は医者で、王子を救ってハッピーエンドを迎えていたけど、私の前世は看護師…新薬作って手術してって色々ハードル高すぎなんですが！　そもそも男性免疫ゼロなアラサー喪女の私には、男性攻略キャラとの恋愛なんて－－難しすぎる！！
「こうなったら私、世界と私の新しい人生のために－－ナイチンゲールを目指してやりますわ！」

---
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9544fe/)
* [Original Light Novel](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09SLVRRDL)
